patthana23.42:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana23.42:1.1_0: One should not trying to grasp at the wrong time, nor to the principle at the wrong time.
patthana23.42:2.1_0: One does not grasp at the appropriate time of taking up practices that has non-physical fuel.
patthana23.42:3.1_0: One should not give rise to confidence in those without it. It’s not appropriate for someone practicing to grasp that’s suitable reason.
